SELECT FROM users WHERE id = 5: CREATE TABLE orders id INT, total FLOAT
SELECT COUNT(name) FROM customers GROUP BY country
SELECT u.name, o.total FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user
SELECT name FROM users WHERE id IN (SELECT * FROM admins)

SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 0 OR 1=1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = 'John' OR '1'='1'
